sentence: how many states border the mississippi river ?
sentence-with-vars: how many states border the river0 ?
sql: select count ( distinct border_info.border ) from border_info where border_info.state_name in ( select river.traverse from river where river.river_name = ' mississippi ' ) ;
sql-with-vars: select count ( distinct border_info.border ) from border_info where border_info.state_name in ( select river.traverse from river where river.river_name = ' river0 ' ) ;
